ygData.subject: Re: Re: Grrrrrrrr!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hey Hamonic, I would like to say Oh! yeah, all the way to Djarn huh? and from the bat cave too? wow. But I have no Idea what you are talking about, and
ygData.messageBody:
Harmonic wrote:

> druids to 40. This is such a non-issue, tracking ranges are
> not affected greatly by slight skill differences. A ranger can,
> however, track Djarn from the bat cave, where I cannot. So that's
> the difference between 100 and 200. Otherwise, I can see everything
> else the ranger can.

Hey Hamonic, I would like to say "Oh! yeah, all the way to Djarn huh?
and from the bat cave too? wow." But I have no Idea what you are talking
about, and If I don't then I'm sure a lot of others don't too. Do you
mean a LOOONG way or just a little way? Can they track Bandl McMarrin
from Permafrost, or maybe just Captain silverwind from the bank in
Kelethin? Give us a scale to measure that you don't have to be 40th to
go by :)

Uldar Ulfangson
35th Bard, Rodcet Nife
